abstract: The modest increase indicated a belief that a leak would be repaired and the Alaskan pipeline would be back on line before oil supplies tightened substantially.
snippet: The modest increase indicated a belief that a leak would be repaired and the Alaskan pipeline would be back on line before oil supplies tightened substantially.
lead_paragraph: HOUSTON  Oil prices rose modestly on Monday in response to the shutdown of the Trans Alaska Pipeline System, indicating that traders believed the network would come back on line before supplies tightened substantially in the United States.

headline.main: Oil Prices Only Slightly Higher After Leak Closes Pipeline
headline.print_headline: Oil Prices Only Slightly Higher After Leak Closes Pipeline
